Settings

  • Match Threads
  • Templates

Saving & Processing

When checked, clicking "save" will submit the post and your changes will be visible

Defaults

Select your desired template for creating match threads (see Templates tab for more details)

Upload Template

My Templates

Create New Template

Recommended domain: Imgur.com
Save to .template.json file for distribution

Debugging

When checked, logging will be output to console
When checked, additional debug info will be pushed to console (timestamp, function callers etc.)
